lyrics:
12 contributorsone day lyricsverse 1
one day its here and then its gone
how are you still holdin on
how are you still holdin on
you felt this way for far too long
waitin for a change to come
you know youre not the only one

chorus
and life passes you by
dont be wastin your time on your own

verse 2
youre always tryin to see yourself
through the eyes of someone else
through the eyes of someone else
too shy to say that you need help
you and everybody else
you and everybody else

chorus
oh life passes you by
dont waste your time on your own
yeah life passes you by
dont be wasting your time all alone
you might also likebridge
as your heart gets bigger
and you try to figure out whats it all about
when your skin gets thicker
as you try to figure out whats it all about oh
oohoohooh oohoohoohooh ohohoh
oohoohooh oohoohoohooh noohohoh
oohoohooh oohoohoohooh
oohoohooh oohoohooh

chorus
oohoohooh oohoohoohooh yeah life passes you by
oohoohooh oohoohoohooh dont waste your time on your own
oohoohooh oohoohooh

outro
one day its here and then its gone
how are you still holdin on
how are you still holdin on12embed
